subject: Names, Organizational
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. team in New Orleans, which moved from Charlotte in 2002, will drop its Hornets nickname for next season, and some fans in North Carolina want it back.
snippet: The N.B.A. team in New Orleans, which moved from Charlotte in 2002, will drop its Hornets nickname for next season, and some fans in North Carolina want it back.
